About me

Hello, I'm Yosevu Kilonzo. I'm a developer. I build things for the web at Sparkbox.

I am experienced with small and large full-stack projects with modern HTML, CSS, JavaScript, as well as other tools and technologies. I'm especially interested in Functional Programming, Clojure, and building Integral Software.

I'm also interested in the relationship between writing and thinking as well as the ideas, systems, and tools for thought and insight.

I value communication through connection, dialogue over narrative, questions over answers, thought before action, process over product, and solving the right problem.
